faq.question: What is the Prayer Belts mission statement?
faq.answer: Our Mission is to Spread the Word, Strengthen the Commitment among the Faithful, Attract the Attention of the Un-Churched, Re-Engage the Curiosity of the De-Churched and Create Excitement with a Fun, Fashionable New Way to Pray.

faq.question: What goal is Prayer Belts attempting to accomplish?
faq.answer: Our goal is to equip parents, young adults, teens, boys and girls - anyone of good faith - with a new weapon in the daily battle to profess faith in everyday life.

faq.question: Who is behind Prayer Belts?
faq.answer: Prayer Belts were created by people deeply troubled over the systematic removal of prayer from public life for people who share the common desire to express their faith in public.

faq.question: What are Prayer Belts?
faq.answer: Prayer Belts turns a common fashion accessory into a personal banner for displaying faith in places where such displays are often discouraged or prohibited by embroidering a faith-affirming message onto a stylish, color-fast web-style belt.

faq.question: Which faith-affirming messages are available on Prayer Belts?
What colors do Prayer Belts come in?
faq.answer: We are introducing Prayer Belts in black with the faith-affirming messages embroidered in white.

faq.question: What are Prayer Belts made of?
faq.answer: Prayer Belts are made of 100% color-fast polyester.

faq.question: What sizes are available?
faq.answer: Each Prayer Belt is \"One Size\" 48\" long and 1 1/2\" wide.

faq.question: How much do Prayer Belts cost?
faq.answer: The special \"Introductory Price\" for each Prayer Belt is $19.95 plus Shipping & Handling for all orders received by December 31, 2011.

faq.question: Why are customers encouraged to order two (2) Prayer Belts at-a-time?
faq.answer: Customers who order 2 Prayer Belts at-a-time become even better equipped to support our stated mission to Spread the Word because they will have one belt to wear as a personal banner of faith and one belt to share with a relative, a friend, an acquaintance or a complete stranger looking to find their way.

faq.question: How do I pay for my Prayer Belt order?
faq.answer: All orders are made through the company's website, {a href='http://www.prayerbelts.com'}www.prayerbelts.com{/a} and are paid for by Credit Card (VISA, MasterCard, and American Express) or Debit Card.

faq.question: When can I expect delivery of my Prayer Belts?
faq.answer: Our goal is to fill each order within 24-hours and have it delivered within 7 days.
